biography: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia  Ulises Dumont (April 7, 1937 – November 29, 2008) was a prolific Argentine film actor, credited with over 80 appearances in film and countless others in theatre and television from 1964 until his death in 2008.  Description above from the Wikipedia article Ulises Dumont, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Ulises Dumont
